TestReportSteps.testObjective: To verify that user is able to delete crash records.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Invoke the add Crashes API /api/crashdetails. Verify that crashes can be deleted.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able  to delete crash records .
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to delete crash records.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to delete crash records.
